data.message: Die nameless die motherfucker die ,  and it if you ever sold weed or smoked pot before guess what your Welcome ,you think we're dum enough to fiends beating down our door, Ha ha ha. Sidebar back in the day for as long as I can remember all these stories about us and weed lead me to believe that the OG kush is our baby  and I got your Proof so get down on your knees and sick bitch suck on these Your Fuckin Welcome Buch of Bitch ass Hoes what you think it was an accident that no body knows who made it and where it comes from.Ha  Ha Your Mother Fuckin welcome so Die mother fucker die nameless! I'm Fuckin shameless  and you could fit all the drugs I sold in a big ass shipping Warehouse coast to coast  #natgeo  around the world. I might die nameless but Fuck you we left are mark so you think your smart Ha ha ha Die Nameless to a real country fan ha ha.  Don't get it twisted impersonation is the highest form of flattery
